data.text: Those who want to know what is right to do want to be ◄disciplined/corrected► when they do what is wrong;
Yahweh is pleased with good people,
People do not become secure/safe by doing what is wicked;
A good wife is one who causes her husband to be greatly honored,
What righteous people want to do is to treat people fairly;
What wicked people say is like a trap [MET] that kills [MTY] people who pass by,
Wicked people will die before they become old and we will see them no more,
People will praise those who have good sense,
It is better to be a humble/ordinary person who has only one servant
Righteous people take care of their domestic animals,
Farmers who work hard in their fields will produce good crops that will give them plenty to eat,
Wicked people desire to take away what other evil people have,
Evil people are trapped by the evil things that they say [MTY],
People are rewarded for the good things that they say to others,
Foolish people always think that what they are doing is right;
Foolish people quickly become angry when someone does something that they don’t like;
In the courtroom, honest people say what is true,
What some people say hurts people badly, as much as [SIM] a sword can;
When people tell [MTY] lies, others soon realize that what they said is not true [IDM];
Those who plan to do what is evil are always wanting to deceive others,
Bad things usually [HYP] do not happen to righteous people,
Yahweh detests those [MTY] who tell lies,
Those with good sense do not reveal all that they know;
Those [SYN] who work hard become rulers of others;
When people are anxious/worried, they become depressed/dejected,
Godly/Righteous people try to give good advice to their friends (OR, try to make friends with others),
Lazy people do not even cook the meat of the animals that they catch/kill,
Those who ◄live righteously/continually do what is right► are walking on the road to a long life;
